product_name: Pepper's Sabre Polarized Sunglasses - Shiny Black Frame - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring shiny black frames to go with any style you choose, the Pepper's Sabre Sunglasses use polarized lenses to cut down on glare in bright light so you can enjoy your time in the sun. Triacetate polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement, for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Pepper's Sabre Polarized Sunglasses feature polarized green lenses. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring shiny black frames to go with any style you choose, the Pepper's Sabre Sunglasses use polarized lenses to cut down on glare in bright light so you can enjoy your time in the sun.
